# <a name="keyboard-shortcuts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="91746-102">Tasti di scelta rapida in Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91746-102">Keyboard shortcuts in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91746-103">In Outlook.com è possibile utilizzare gli stessi tasti di scelta rapida del servizio di posta elettronica utilizzato per l'utilizzo, ad esempio Gmail, Yahoo mail o Outlook.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91746-103">In Outlook.com you can use the same keyboard shortcuts as the email service you're used to working with, such as Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or Outlook.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91746-104">Passare a [impostazioni di accessibilità](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91746-104">Go to [Accessibility settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="91746-105">**Impostazioni**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91746-105">**Settings**</span></span> 
 > <span data-ttu-id="91746-106">**Visualizzazione di tutte le impostazioni**  >  di Outlook **Informazioni generali**  >  **Accessibilità**) e scegli quali tasti di scelta rapida desideri utilizzare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91746-106">**View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Accessibility**) and choose which keyboard shortcuts you'd like use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91746-107">Per visualizzare l'elenco completo dei tasti di scelta rapida, vedere [Outlook.com tasti di scelta rapida](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91746-107">To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, see [Outlook.com keyboard shortcuts](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
